org.ietf.nea.pt.value

Class PtTlsMessageValueFactoryIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ietf.nea.pt.value.PtTlsMessageValueFactoryIetf

  • public final class PtTlsMessageValueFactoryIetf
extends Object
    Factory utility to create a IETF RFC 6876 compliant transport message value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private PtTlsMessageValueFactoryIetf()
      Private constructor should never be invoked.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PtTlsMessageValueError createErrorValue(long errorVendorId, long errorCode, byte[] messageCopy)
      Creates transport message error value with a byte copy of the erroneous message.
      static PtTlsMessageValueExperimental createExperimentalValue(String value)
      Creates an experimental transport message value with the given content.
      static PtTlsMessageValuePbBatch createPbBatchValue(ByteBuffer tnccsData)
      Creates transport message value with a TNCCS batch.
      static PtTlsMessageValueSaslAuthenticationData createSaslAuthenticationDataValue(byte[] authenticationData)
      Creates transport message value with a SASL authentication data.
      static PtTlsMessageValueSaslMechanismSelection createSaslMechanismSelectionValue(SaslMechanismEntry mechanism)
      Creates transport message value with a SASL mechanism selection.
      static PtTlsMessageValueSaslMechanismSelection createSaslMechanismSelectionValue(SaslMechanismEntry mechanism, byte[] initialData)
      Creates transport message value with a SASL mechanism selection and initial SASL data.
      static PtTlsMessageValueSaslMechanisms createSaslMechanismsValue(SaslMechanismEntry... mechanisms)
      Creates a transport message value containing SASL mechanisms.
      static PtTlsMessageValueSaslResult createSaslResultValue(PtTlsSaslResultEnum result)
      Creates transport message value with a SASL authentication result.
      static PtTlsMessageValueSaslResult createSaslResultValue(PtTlsSaslResultEnum result, byte[] resultData)
      Creates transport message value with a SASL authentication result and additional SASL result data.
      static PtTlsMessageValueVersionRequest createVersionRequestValue(short minVersion, short maxVersion, short preferredVersion)
      Creates a version request transport message value.
      static PtTlsMessageValueVersionResponse createVersionResponseValue(short selectedVersion)
      Creates a version response transport message value.

      • createVersionRequestValue

        public static PtTlsMessageValueVersionRequest createVersionRequestValue(short minVersion,
                                                        short maxVersion,
                                                        short preferredVersion)
        Creates a version request transport message value.
        Parameters:
        minVersion - the minimal version supported
        maxVersion - the maximal version supported
        preferredVersion - the preferred version
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 6876 compliant transport message value

      • createVersionResponseValue

        Creates a version response transport message value.
        Parameters:
        selectedVersion - the selected version
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 6876 compliant transport message value

        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 6876 compliant transport message value

                                      long errorCode,
                                      byte[] messageCopy)
        Creates transport message error value with a byte copy of the erroneous message.
        Parameters:
        errorVendorId - the error vendor ID
        errorCode - the error code describing the error
        messageCopy - the byte copy of the erroneous message
        Returns:
        an IETF RFC 6876 compliant transport message value
